title: MaxTronic Fast Direct Charging Remote Control Cars, 360° Flip Waterproof Stunt Car with ON/OFF Cool LED, 2.4GHz 4WD Indoor Outdoor Kids RC Toy Gift ideas for Kids Boys Girls
features: 【Fast USB Type-C Direct Charging】 Adopt built-in rechargeable battery design and equipped with a charging cable, through the power supply can directly charge the remote control cars anytime, anywhere. Plug & Charge. Safe & Convenient. There's no need to disassemble anything, ready to go anywhere.

【Amphibious waterproof rc car】 This new design monster truck is totally Waterproof. The amphibious toys car for kids 3-12 years old rolls on all surfaces: land, water, grass, pool, beach and even carpet!

【Cool Stunts】With 360 degree rotation, 180 degree double sided flips, cool LEDs and high Speed Powerful motor provide you a realistic driving experience. stunt car lights on / off can be switched to meet the needs of diversity. No matter in the day or night it can attract kids' attention anywhere.

【Play Anywhere; Play Together】 Simplified remote control buttons allow children to get started easily, play this rc car in the livingroom, bedroom, outdoors at the park. 2.4ghz transmitter allows multiple players to play at the same time with no signal interference. If you are novice, don't worry, auto demo function will help you quickly master the cool stunts of rc car.

【Safety Commitment】Made of high-quality ABS materials that are non-toxic and environmentally friendly. The battery has a short-circuit protection feature and an overcharge-protection function ensuring a safer play experience for children.
description: Product Description Plug and charge with usb-c cable directly, faster and more convenient. New remote with demo mode to auto show its stunts, new switch to control its colorful light and one-press to slide to take off the battery cover, no any assembly. Fancy Stunt Design This rc stunt car with unique protective cage enables 360° flips and turns without damaging the car. Tire upgrades do not require inflation. USB Type-C Direct Charging This remote control cars Built-in 3.7V 600mAh lithium battery, Fast direct charge it with USB-C cable without any screw disassembly Waterproof Design MaxTronic Amphibious remote control cars creates great fun on multi-terrain,floors, lawn, sand, swimming pools, pond, beach etc. !
